tool_description: This API lets you input any search query to fetch comprehensive results, including from Google Search and other engines, directly from the SERP.
name: Search Engine API
title: Search Engine API

api_list.name: /SearchGateway/basic-search
api_list.description: This API endpoint executes a basic search against selected search engines with the specified parameters.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Mandatory search query. Default is \\\"Wikipedia BigBen\\\".

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: Optional level of safe search filtering. Options include 0 (None, default), 1 (Moderate), 2 (Strict).

optional_parameters.name: engines
optional_parameters.description: Optional comma-separated list of search engines to use. Options include 'bing', 'duckduckgo', 'google', 'mojeek', 'qwant', 'startpage', 'yahoo'. An empty list defaults to all engines.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Optional page number of the search results to return. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Optional language for the search. Options include 'all', 'en', 'en-US', 'de', 'it-IT', 'fr', 'fr-BE'. Default is 'all'.

optional_parameters.name: timeRange
optional_parameters.description: Optional time range for the search results. Options include 'day', 'week', 'month', 'year'.
